{{Disambiguation}}

'''Potato''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{ItemLink|Potato}}, an item that can be eaten by the player, used to breed pigs, or smelted into a baked potato
* {{ItemLink|Baked Potato}}, an item that restores more hunger and saturation than a raw potato
* {{ItemLink|Poisonous Potato}}, an poisonous item that rarely drops when harvesting a potato crop

=== Jokes ===
* [[24w14potato]] is a {{el|je}} snapshot, released as an [[April Fools' joke]] for 2024. The snapshot adds many potato-related features.
